actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the special rule for contributions of qualified conservation contributions.
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text: Conservation Easement Incentive Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the tax deduction for charitable contributions by individuals and corporations of real property interests for conservation purposes.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the special rule for contributions of qualified conservation contributions.
